column1: is not in conformity with clause 4(c) it must be treated as a violation.
Paragraph 4(c) of the regulation marked P7 reads as follows;
'Local  Manufacturers,  who  import  goods  as  raw  material  which  are  not  available
locally  but  required  for  manufacturing  of  their  products  with  minimum  local  value
addition of 30% or more, subject or more to a letter of authorization issued by the
Controller  General  of  Imports  and  Exports  based  on  the  recommendation  of  the
Secretary, Ministry of Industries, prior to arrival of such goods to any ports or airports
